West Palatium Promenade.
Snowflakes float down around you, colouring the world white. Weaving in an infinity loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged fire serpent eyes his surroundings with a menacing stare. A brittle-looking grey shard surrounded with a pulsing blue glow lies here. There are 6 corpses of an Arcadian sentry here. There are 5 corpses of an Arcadian woman here. There are 2 corpses of an Arcadian man here. There are 8 corpses of an Arcadian archer here. There are 4 corpses of an Arcadian nobleman here. There are 3 corpses of an Arcadian bureaucrat here. There are 14 corpses of an Arcadian royal guard here. A feather duster clutched in her fingers, the corpse of an Arcadian palace maid lies here. A thin dusting of white flour covers the corpse of Lucinda, the Arcadian royal chef. There are 4 corpses of an Arcadian noblewoman here.You see exits leading southeast and northwest.

6008h, 5629m, 25215e, 15488w  exckdb----
Dread Legate Kelandra Lichlord (female Elder Black Dragon).
She is 247 years old, having been born on the 7th of Daedalan, 426 years after the fall of the Seleucarian Empire.
She is ranked 49th in Achaea.
She is an extremely credible character.
She is not known for acts of infamy.
She is an Exsusiai in Mhaldor.
She is a Maggot in the army of Mhaldor.
She is considered to be approximately 105% of your might.
She is a Legate of the Truths in the Dread Legates.
She is a mentor and able to take on proteges.
She has been divorced once.
See HONOURS DEEDS KELANDRA to view her 5 special honours.

6008h, 5233m, 26210e, 12030w [guard376269]93% exckdb----
Meticulously crafted from a multitude of large, flexible dragon scales, the exterior of this pack scintillates with shades of electric blue. Large and spacious within, the container is lined with soft, waterproofed cotton and reinforced on the bottom with a thick panel of leather. Two matching, tooled leather straps secure the pack over the shoulders of the owner comfortably, their surfaces decorated with the sinuous images of blue dragons in flight.
It weighs about 5 pounds.
It bears the distinctive mark of Dartega.

5858h, 5629m, 26194e, 8816w  exckdb----
Meticulously crafted from a multitude of large, flexible dragon scales, the exterior of this pack scintillates with shades of electric blue. Large and spacious within, the container is lined with soft, waterproofed cotton and reinforced on the bottom with a thick panel of leather. Two matching, tooled leather straps secure the pack over the shoulders of the owner comfortably, their surfaces decorated with the sinuous images of blue dragons in flight.
It weighs about 5 pounds.
It bears the distinctive mark of Dartega.

6008h, 5639m, 26156e, 8954w  exckdb----
You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. Festive boughs of holly are decked out in your surroundings. Bright red berries peek out from the holly. A sprig of mistletoe has been hung here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Jinsun's final moments. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. There are 2 stone gargoyles here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Vyn. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A black mamba slithers here. A red-crested falcon focuses its piercing gaze on you as it stands proudly here. A giant, obsidian scorpion stands restively, its two huge tails overhanging its head and its huge pincers flexing and clicking. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A light smudge of green indicates a pinch of malachite dusts the ground here. There are 4 magnesium chips in 4 groups here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. Nestled into the ground is a small chunk of potash crystal. Regal and commanding, a Dardanic stallion watches over his surroundings.  Minister Xinna, Crusher of Wills is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption in her right. Alchemist Vyn Taver, of the Ether is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an obsidian dagger in his right. Shikan Jacintha Devi-Rian, Dedicant of the North is here. Warlord Jhui Ta'sa, Lord of the Crossing is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and a tower shield in his right. Void Carnifex Jinsun Ze'Dekiah, Twin-born Assassin is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand. Warlock Convert Vrass Rousseau is here, sprawled on the floor. She wields a Shield of Absorption in her left hand and a living vodun doll of Atalkez in her right. Dread Legate Atalkez al'Dejan is here. Void Carnifex Jinsun Ze'Dekiah, Twin-born Assassin is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.
You are breathing lightly.

6008h, 5619m, 26210e, 9140w  exckdb----
The gates of Mhaldor.
A noxious, red-hued fog overwhelms the area with a thick, palpable vapour. Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. Some graffiti has been scrawled here. It reads, "Know ye that there is no truth greater than Evil." There are 5 knights of the Maldaathi here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. An enormous slab of volcanic obsidian towers over this area, the regulations of Mhaldor etched upon its face. An occupied iron gibbet, suspended from a wooden gallows, creaks ominously in the breeze. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. An enormous slab of volcanic obsidian towers over this area, the laws of Mhaldor etched upon its face. The broken fragments of a basalt altar litter the ground around the massive form of a bloodsteel stalagmite. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A box lantern of thin red parchment lights the surroundings with cheerful images of Logosmas. Reflecting a splash of marine tones, a pair of high heeled shoes rest here. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Like a fluffy ball, a dingo pup lies on his back. Its feline eyes bright with interest, a dirangi cub lazes on the ground. A small black squirrel watches the surroundings with interest. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards.
You see exits leading east, south, west, and up.

The gates of Mhaldor.
A noxious, red-hued fog overwhelms the area with a thick, palpable vapour. Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. Some graffiti has been scrawled here. It reads, "Know ye that there is no truth greater than Evil." There are 5 knights of the Maldaathi here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. An enormous slab of volcanic obsidian towers over this area, the regulations of Mhaldor etched upon its face. An occupied iron gibbet, suspended from a wooden gallows, creaks ominously in the breeze. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. An enormous slab of volcanic obsidian towers over this area, the laws of Mhaldor etched upon its face. The broken fragments of a basalt altar litter the ground around the massive form of a bloodsteel stalagmite. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A box lantern of thin red parchment lights the surroundings with cheerful images of Logosmas. Reflecting a splash of marine tones, a pair of high heeled shoes rest here. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Regal and commanding, a Dardanic stallion watches over his surroundings. There are 2 swift ghost bats here.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards.
You see exits leading east, south, west, and up.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. Festive boughs of holly are decked out in your surroundings. Bright red berries peek out from the holly. A sprig of mistletoe has been hung here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Jinsun's final moments. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. There are 2 stone gargoyles here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A black mamba slithers here. A red-crested falcon focuses its piercing gaze on you as it stands proudly here. A giant, obsidian scorpion stands restively, its two huge tails overhanging its head and its huge pincers flexing and clicking. A light smudge of green indicates a pinch of malachite dusts the ground here. There are 5 magnesium chips in 5 groups here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. Nestled into the ground is a small chunk of potash crystal. A skullcap flower lies here. A small axe lies here, discarded. A small flake of gleaming aurum rests upon the ground.  Minister Xinna, Crusher of Wills is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption in her right. Shikan Jacintha Devi-Rian, Dedicant of the North is here. Dread Legate Atalkez al'Dejan is here. Warlord Jhui Ta'sa, Lord of the Crossing is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and a tower shield in his right.

The gates of Mhaldor.
A noxious, red-hued fog overwhelms the area with a thick, palpable vapour. Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. Some graffiti has been scrawled here. It reads, "Know ye that there is no truth greater than Evil." There are 5 knights of the Maldaathi here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. The broken fragments of a basalt altar litter the ground around the massive form of a bloodsteel stalagmite. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A box lantern of thin red parchment lights the surroundings with cheerful images of Logosmas. Reflecting a splash of marine tones, a pair of high heeled shoes rest here.
